mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing touch targets and navigation elements for smaller devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the size of image files and implement lazy loading to speed up page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta tags and headings for better keyword targeting and visibility.
userExperienceTip: Add more visual cues for interactive elements, such as hover effects on buttons.
